website_summaries.verdict: Choose this mallet if you'd like to give the fiberglass handle a try. It offers nice craftsmanship and is suitable for many small household projects.
pros: Has interesting combination of classic rubber head and patented fiberglass handle
cons: Seems a bit too light for some tasks that require weight behind strikes
A few defective tools upon arrival have been noted

customer_reviews.title: Beast of a Mallet
customer_reviews.text: This mallet allowed me to beat the daylights out of the projects I used it for. The firm rubber head held up to the vigorous pounding. It truly feels like a sweet addition to my hands when working with it. It has endless uses to show anything who's the boss.
customer_reviews.author: Theguy

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: DID NOT LAST! Finished installing about 200 square feet of wood flooring and it started falling apart piece by piece. The rubber is too soft! Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: iwona

customer_reviews.title: A piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT even with it's great rating that sold me. The white side of this mallet's edge shattered on my first less than hard blow. Contacted manufacturer (Top X Direct) and received zero response. This was not surprising in that the Company is Chinese; and it is unconscionable that Amazon does not divulge this information. Thankfully I was able to use Amazon's customer friendly return system and obtain credit for this abysmal product, and replace it with a USA manufacturer with a good return policy.
customer_reviews.author: 11JLE

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Good hammer. The person who panned it because it came apart when he was pounding in a pipe needs to learn what a rubber mallet is used for.
customer_reviews.author: heyrube

customer_reviews.title: The head material is not good quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and feels good on hand, so i was excited to use it on light jobs like, removing panels easier, or adjusting some easy connect tiles, but this didnt work that way. As soon as i used it to open electric panel that was stuck it started brittling away. Won't last. 1 or 2 jobs
customer_reviews.author: Nesto

customer_reviews.title: Really nice mallet, tough rubber and feels durable
customer_reviews.text: This mallet works great for my purposes. I use it for bike repair and some woodworking tasks and it's been perfect so far. The rubber is tougher than some other mallets I've had and the fiberglass handle is nice because I've broken many wood handles before (hence why I needed to order this in the first place). We'll see how long it lasts but for now I'm very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Ian B

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: bought the mallet to put down the white reflective tape, that I purchased same day from Amazon, on front concrete steps, This is second winter the tape is holding in place, also steps get the leaf blower treatment once a week. This tape stays in place when installed by instructions.
customer_reviews.author: W.H. Boston JR

customer_reviews.title: What a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Received my mallet today and was very disappointed. The overall tool itself seems to be decent quality, but the mallet rubber itself was sent to me with what looks like a huge gouge in the side of it (seen in photos). Maybe this is completely normal and is part of the molding process, but it’s an eye-sore in my opinion, and isn’t something I enjoy seeing when I purchase a brand new product. I’d recommend looking elsewhere if you’re in the market for a new mallet.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Lost of the Mallets
customer_reviews.text: this is a great mallet, for the tool kit. I got the 24 oz one, which is heavy- but obviously being 24 oz you knew that, I also do not know why it rates the weight... I use this for dismantling metal shelving units.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Salvaggio

customer_reviews.title: Poor mallet quality or was piece defective?
customer_reviews.text: Sir, No doubt the ha dle quality is very good. However my very forst use on a rubberised wooden bench am making and the mallet’s rubber chipped away. I am concerned about recieving a defective product or the quality is questionable of the rubber
customer_reviews.author: Zios M.

customer_reviews.title: Great mallet and awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: Does the job I need it to do and so far it’s been durable. One of the owners jerry made sure I received the product and that if I needed anything they were ready to help. Great customer service guys , I will recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: Quentin Coldwater

customer_reviews.title: great hammer
customer_reviews.text: works great for wood flooring and metal railings tried a couple others but was not happy with them this one has just the right amount of firmness and a great feeling handle grip love it DH
customer_reviews.author: DHminnesota

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and study. Used it for some automotive work and it met all expectations.
customer_reviews.author: FTW

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy design
customer_reviews.text: My old wooden handled mallet cracked so I wanted a fiberglass one. This one fit the bill. Its sturdy and the handle is a lot longer than my old one which provides more force. Can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason P

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction with good balance. Will update if the rubber seems to crack early as I've had problems with other mallets in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Green

customer_reviews.title: Two faced but very friendly
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for making square pegs fit into round holes when you really need it. Some might say this mallet is two faced but we get along great and completed our vinyl plank basement floor installation with out issue.
customer_reviews.author: Ben S.

customer_reviews.title: great mallet
customer_reviews.text: thought i had every tool in the world until i needed rubber mallet. this did a great job of banging the wheels onto my cart without breaking anything.
customer_reviews.author: fern

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: It works well and has a great grip handle. It also minimizes sound so it makes a lot less noise opposed to using a hammer. Which is great because I live in an apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Rubber comes off during hard use; a practical tool
customer_reviews.text: This is my second mallet. Pounding landscape edging really damages them. I bought a new one so I would have one after this project.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Clark

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good grip on handle
customer_reviews.text: I chose this product over more traditional looking mallets because it looked like the handle had good grip and it didn’t dissapoint. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put together two metal shelving units. it works great. Rubber is hard enough to do the job but not so hard it bends the metal or cracks.
customer_reviews.author: SpeedD408

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: sturdy mallet. much more durable than a wooden handled one
customer_reviews.author: Big Nate

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: It is indeed a nice looking rubber mallet. Have not had a chance to use it though!
customer_reviews.author: Ceshel

customer_reviews.title: Great for installing vinyl or laminate flooring!
customer_reviews.text: It's well built and I like the bright orange color, as it should help me from leaving it behind on a job.
customer_reviews.author: Veganman

customer_reviews.title: 2 color is fantastic as i need for connecting white and bronze aluminum extrusions
customer_reviews.text: Great product, early delivery,, unexpected fiberglass handle. Exactly what I need to work on white and bronze aluminum "snap together" extrusions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works as expected
customer_reviews.text: its a hammer to be prepared for this thing to take a beating.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: like it very much but black part chipped off which ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it for my floor installation, like it very much but black part chipped off which is probably normal for that type of work
customer_reviews.author: Vasya

customer_reviews.title: Great hammer for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this hammer! Looks great and hasn’t broke apart yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jayson

customer_reviews.title: woodworking & hammer goodness
customer_reviews.text: solid comfy feel. price is right value for item. just getting back into woodworking so this good entry point. thumbs up !
customer_reviews.author: stinky

customer_reviews.title: Hammer Seems Solid
customer_reviews.text: Got this hammer for my father as a Christmas present so he'd stop asking for the old one which broke several months ago. This hammer seems sturdy for the value -- and, though he hasn't had a chance to use it yet, he's very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Martinsen

customer_reviews.title: Buy it and hit stuff with it.
customer_reviews.text: Finally had several opportunities to use this mallet. It works well and it seems of good quality. I hope to have it forever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What could go wrong?
customer_reviews.text: A rubber mallet, not much can go wrong but I haven’t had the opportunity to use it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Don Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Feels good
customer_reviews.text: Used this to assemble some Rubbermaid storage sheds. Looks good. Feels good. Worked great. Nice solid tool. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. It came faster than I thought it was supposed to show up. Seems to very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: glen

customer_reviews.title: Hammer
customer_reviews.text: It's a hammer how do you mess that up. You can't and they didn't. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: It's a rubber mallet. What can I say? It does it's job and doesn't seem to be faulty.
customer_reviews.author: David Good

customer_reviews.title: Really awesome for the price! Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great feel, great quality and nice and heavy like I needed. Can't go wrong with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Grenrir

customer_reviews.title: Good solid hammer with the 2 faced option.
customer_reviews.text: Good solid hammer with the 2 faced option. Quality seems excellent. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: JEB

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Good hammer good price. Stuck on the side of the road my caliber bolt came off on the brakes. This hammer saved the day.
customer_reviews.author: Henry wear

customer_reviews.title: Great mallet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this before doing my patio to help set bricks. Since then its been used on everything from insect extermination to working on vehicles to woodworking. Excellent piece of equipment at such a low price. Definitely reccomend
customer_reviews.author: ERIC B.

customer_reviews.title: good quality product
customer_reviews.text: This mallet is inexpensive, is of good quality, and has fun colorful design.
customer_reviews.author: Diver Dan

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than any I have owned before.
customer_reviews.text: The orange color is great so you can find it on the job sight.
customer_reviews.author: D. R.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality Mallet
customer_reviews.text: Solid weight, have used it many times and the rubber is holding up well. No issues with it at all, would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S. Cotton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used this to install a vinyl plank floor. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Hammer TIme
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight and feel, has held up, the handle seems very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Siddle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good mallet. I've whacked various things with it, and it does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: mashmash

customer_reviews.title: my favorite thing to hit things with
customer_reviews.text: Gotta say, it turns out that I really do love using my mallet and this one is the perfect weight for me
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Feels great and help up awesome! Used this to help knock out a bend on a car rim. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Light and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Light but still dense for effective weight to pound effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Roz12

customer_reviews.title: Solid Mallet
customer_reviews.text: Very solid mallet. Fiberglass handle works well to dampen vibration to the hand. Dual colors help from scuffing and leaving marks on installing parts that need a small touch of alignment to assemble. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Dragon821

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS LIKE IT’LL LAST FOREVER
customer_reviews.text: Feels very sturdy; I used it to assemble a white plastic shower chair, the white half of the head left no dents or smudges.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for pounding things.
customer_reviews.text: I knocked a spike into the ground with it one time... It was effective and satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: Zachery P Giuffria

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good mallet for the price but rubber has been falling off since I’m using it on metal.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: beem using it a few months feels good in hands no slip solid so far I lime it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not that good
customer_reviews.text: Used for one day at work and the head started coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Watson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Just as described and works well in a home garage.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Holsopple

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well built mallet- would buy again but it will last forever
customer_reviews.author: Adam Sangiolo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can hammer stuff. Only had a couple of months but no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hammer
customer_reviews.text: I only used it 2 times but I feel it’s a great mallet.
customer_reviews.author: Antwan Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Hoping for resolution
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought this was a great lightweight alternative to the other higher priced alternatives. I should have known better. Not sure how this could have happened but my seven year old granddaughter found out how to chip the corner of the white side of the mallet while pounding in a kids croquet stake just the second time of use. Completely disappointing to also find out that the seller only has a 30 day return policy. Hoping they will just replace the item.
customer_reviews.author: SA Stroud

customer_reviews.title: Good mallet
customer_reviews.text: It did the job and didn't break. Solid rubber mallet.
customer_reviews.author: RT3057

customer_reviews.title: does as it should
customer_reviews.text: little harder then rubber then i expected but gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality hammer at a low cost. At home depot this would cost a few bucks more.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, yet light tool.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't really used this for anything major yet...but I see how the length of the handle and the light material makes it a powerful tool around the house. It seems well-balanced and easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Babel

customer_reviews.title: I can't help but wonder how long this one will last...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this one to replace one that I broke that had a wooden handle that broke. I used this one once, and it felt nice and sturdy, and did what I needed it to do, but a piece of the rubber broke off. Never happened on any of my old cheapies. I was hammering a piece of steel pipe into the ground. Yes, I obviously was off center, but really didn't expect this to happen. The handle itself feels comfortable in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: FlamingoNut

customer_reviews.title: nice texture and design i used it 1 time and ...
customer_reviews.text: Its Small, nice texture and design i used it 1 time and that was that.
customer_reviews.author: elisa boyas

product_meta.title: TopBuilt 16 Ounce Black Rubber Mallet with Fiberglass Handle 25050
product_meta.description:
The TOPBUILT rubber mallet combines a fine grade rubber head on a new designed fiberglass handle. 

The TOPBUILT rubber mallet combines a fine grade rubber head on a new designed fiberglass handle. 
TOPBUILT Patent fiberglass handle. 
Rubber head helps minimize marring and surface damage. 
Unified fiberglass handle fixed with epoxy resin and safety pin. 
Fiberglass core adds strength and help reduce vibrations. 
Ergonomic comfortable grip prevent slippage.
feature_bullets: Rubber head helps minimize marring and surface damage
Unified fiberglass handle fixed with epoxy resin and safety pin
Fiberglass core adds strength and help reduce vibrations

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars176 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
